mapper.select: select * from MEMBERS
select M.*, P.* from MEMBERS M left join POINT P ON M.member_num = P.member_num where M.member_num = #{member_num};
select * from DETAIL;
mapper.update: update MEMBERS set member_num = #{member_num}, member_pass = #{member_pass}, member_name = #{member_name}, member_phone = #{member_phone}, member_email = #{member_email}, member_address = #{member_address}, member_grade = CASE WHEN (select point_cumulativeP from POINT where member_num = #{member_num}) >= 50000 THEN '골드' WHEN (select point_cumulativeP from POINT where member_num = #{member_num}) >= 30000 THEN '실버' ELSE '브론즈' END where member_num = #{member_num}

update POINT set point_currentP = GREATEST(point_currentP + #{sPoint}, 0), point_cumulativeP = CASE WHEN #{sPoint} >= 0 THEN point_cumulativeP + #{sPoint} ELSE point_cumulativeP END where member_num = #{member_num}

update POINT set point_history = CONCAT(IFNULL(point_history, ''), case WHEN LENGTH(IFNULL(point_history, '')) > 0 THEN CHAR(10) -- 줄바꿈 추가 ELSE '' END, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i'), ' / 지급(차감)된 포인트: ', #{sPoint}, ' / ', #{point_detail}) where member_num = #{member_num}
update MEMBERS set member_status = '탈퇴유예', member_respite = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, member_out = DATE_ADD(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, INTERVAL 6 MONTH) where member_num = #{member_num}
update MEMBERS set member_status = '회원', member_respite = NULL, member_out = NULL where member_num = #{member_num}

mapper.select: select exists (select 1 from MOVIE where title = #{title})
